name: job-portal
description:
Job Portal

A free and open source job hunting and recruiting solution build with React, Node, Express, MongoDB and TailwindCSS

scripts.install:all: npm run install:server && npm run install:client
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm start" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.start:railway: cd server && node -e "process.env.TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true; process.env.TS_NODE_SKIP_PROJECT=true; require('ts-node').register({transpileOnly:true, skipProject:true}); require('./src/server.ts');"
